name: Haunted (itch) (It's Bocchi, TheSoshite)
description:
MORE INFO: This game was created for the NOKIA 3310 JAM (https://itch.io/jam/nokiajam3)
The theme of the jam was "ON /OFF". We thought of several ideas, and the ones we liked the most was creating a kind of  "escape from this place" game.

Created by Its Bocchi and TheSoshite.
